product_name: Wasatch Powder Monkeys FatCat 4 Adapter Kit
long_description: The Wasatch Powder Monkeys FatCat 4 Adapter Kit makes your Yakima FatCat 4 Ski/Snowboard Mount compatible with the Wasatch Powder Monkeys Switchblade Crossbars (sold separately). The adapter kit attaches to your Yakima FatCat 4 Ski/Snowboard Mount so you can easily slide it on and off the Switchblade Crossbars without tools. 6061 aluminum components are CNC machined for precision and feature anodizing for strength and durability. Stainless-steel fasteners and tough nylon provide long-term durability, light weight, and high strength-to-weight ratio. Kit also works with the SmartStorage Wall Storage Unit (sold separately), so you can securely mount your FatCat in the garage when not in use.
short_description: The Wasatch Powder Monkeys FatCat 4 Adapter Kit makes your Yakima FatCat 4 Ski/Snowboard Mount compatible with the Wasatch Powder Monkeys Switchblade Crossbars (sold separately).
